document_data.mainbody: '''Clan Tlassian''' was one of the [[dragonborn]] [[Thymari#Clans|clans]] of the nation of [[Tymanther]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/Death before Dishonor|8}}
document_data.Description: Members of Clan Tlassian used their distinctive clan piercings on their left check.{{Cite organized play/LFR/Death before Dishonor|6}}
document_data.History:
Clan Tlassian was a small clan in [[1479 DR]]. The clan gained status in [[Thymari]] society when [[Tarhun]] became the [[Vanquisher]], as the Tlassians offered to him their staunch military support. As a reward, Tarhun gave to them the lands to the east of [[Djerad Thymar]],{{Cite organized play/LFR/Death before Dishonor|7}}

Aside from their role as defenders of the lands located to the east of Djerad Thymar, the Tlassians were known as one of the farming clans of Tymanther. They also specialized in metalwork, and were specially renowned for the quality of their armorcraft.

They were traditional rivals of [[Clan Vkriss]].

During the [[Second Sundering]], most of the Tlassian farms may have been lost when [[Abeir]] and [[Toril]] exchanged lands.<ref group="note">According to chapter 2 of ''[[The Devil You Know]]'', all the farms to the east of Djerad Thymar were returned to Abeir when both worlds exchanged lands on [[Nightal 26]] of [[1486 DR]].

*[[Tlassian Antar Ludovic]], the chief smith of the clan in 1479 DR.
*[[Tlassian Trank Eldwing]], a young smith of the clan in 1479 DR.{{Cite organized play/LFR/Death before Dishonor|5}}
*[[Tearn]], a skilled [[warlock]]{{Cite organized play/LFR/Death before Dishonor|4}} and a former member of the clan in 1479 DR.
